alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 5:12AM AKST until January 26 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Juneau, Glacier Bay, Chichagof Island, northern Admiralty Island, and portions of the eastern Gulf Coast including Douglas, Hoonah, Gustavus, Pelican, Elfin Cove, and Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Aviation and marine travel could also be impacted at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread fog will develop Tuesday evening and likely become dense at times locally. The threat of dense fog persists into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
